attributes.action: Scrap the plans for a blanket 50mph speed limit on all single lane roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is widely reported the government are planning to cut the speed limit on single carriageway roads to 50mph and enforced it with average speed cameras (SPECS).

The governments own statistics show that less than 5% of road casualties are caused by drivers exceeding a speed limit so why do we need new speed cameras and a lower limits?

Please Gordon Brown, spend more of the £50 Billion taken from drivers every year to improve our roads. This will reduce accidents and contribute far more to road safety than new speed cameras and a lower speed limit.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
